VAspirE.AspirationDef.label: be bonded to a royal animal
VAspirE.AspirationDef.description: {0} would like to bond with one of the royal animals.
VAspirE.AspirationDef.satisfiedWhenText: {0} bonds with either of: Crane, Orangutan, Peacock, Pheasant, Quail, Royal Tiger, Swan, Angora rabbit, Megachicken.
